content.question: The anatomical features that signify both childhood and adulthood featured on the Fang reliquary figure were intended to convey the

choices.label: animosity and conflict among family members
need to protect from childhood diseases
changes associated with the cycle of life

content.answer: changes associated with the cycle of life

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
